main event: A large bright flying object was observed traveling from 220 degrees to 330 degrees with a fiery ball appearance.
interesting points: The object exhibited a curved track while traveling south to north.,The observation lasted for about three minutes.,Officers of the U.S.S. Boston reported seeing the object along with 28 witnesses.,The object created vapor clouds during its flight.,The report emphasized that this was not a satellite.
witness description: officers from the U.S.S. Boston and others at the location
